<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158252</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158252</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Working with an Electronic Dictionary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeiten mit einem elektronischen Verzeichnis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travailler avec un dictionnaire électronique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhar com um dicionário eletrônico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionando con un dizionario elettronico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία με ένα ηλεκτρονικό λεξικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo con un diccionario electrónico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Teachers Instructions for students in using The Electronic Dictionary as a tool to help improve their achievements in English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic Dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrer-Anweisungen für Kursteilnehmer, wenn das 
elektronische Verzeichnis als Hilfsmittel verwendet wird, um zu 
helfen, ihre Ausführungen auf englisch zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions de professeurs pour des étudiants en
employant le dictionnaire électronique comme outil pour aider à 
améliorer leurs accomplissements en anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções dos professores para estudantes em 
usar o dicionário eletrônico como uma ferramenta ajudar melhorar 
suas realizações em inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni degli insegnanti per gli allievi nel 
usando il dizionario elettronico come strumento per contribuire a 
migliorare i loro successi in inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες δασκάλων για τους σπουδαστές σε χρησιμοποίηση 
του ηλεκτρονικού λεξικού ως εργαλείο για να βοηθήσει να βελτιώσει
τα επιτεύγματά τους στα αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instrucciones de los profesores para los 
estudiantes al usar el diccionario electrónico como herramienta para 
ayudar a mejorar sus logros en inglés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektronisches Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dictionnaire électronique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dicionário eletrônico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dizionario elettronico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρονικό λεξικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diccionario electrónico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
